name: Chimp Chef's Dastardly Onion Adventure
description:
In the treehouse kitchen, the monkey head chef berates chimp chef about his bland dish. 

He needs to add onions to the dish so it has some flavour, so chimp chef must head out and find some!

Your goal is to find baby onions from the mother onion's nest and stash them back at the tree bucket. Stash enough onions while dodging the mother onions to win!

Look with Right Stick / Mouse
Move with Left Stick / WASD
Jump with A / Space
Sprint with Left Trigger / Left Shift

This game was made in three days for the Ludum Dare 49.

Programming: Cameron Krebbers
Modelling: Jared Houghton
Music/SFX: Brandon Peckham
Concept Art: Rebecca Maltby
Humanoid animations from Mixamo
